Title: MetroBlog
HomeWiki:
MetroBlog is a windows 8 Metro inspired design written in ASP.Net MVC Razor and HTML5.
See a live demo at http://JustinAngel.net.



Features list

  • Tiles Home Page
    • TwitPic Tiles
    • Twitter Tile
    • Article Tiles with counter
    • Category Tiles
  • Sliding Sidebar
    • Social Networks sidebar
    • Interactive Search sidebar
    • Feed sidebar
    • Contact sidebar
  • Metro-inspired UI
    • Home page
    • Category list
    • Articles
  • Article Comments
  • Full Source Code
